mapper.select: select sp_agency_master.a_member_id from sp_agency_master where sp_agency_master.a_member_id = #{aMemberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sp_agency_master (a_member_id, a_number, a_member_pw, a_member_name, a_member_phone, a_member_gender, a_member_email, a_member_privacy, a_member_doroaddress, a_member_jibunaddress, a_member_detailaddress, a_member_registdate) VALUES (#{aMemberId}, #{aNumber}, #{aMemberPw}, #{aMemberName}, #{aMemberPhone}, #{aMemberGender}, #{aMemberEmail}, #{aMemberPrivacy}, #{aMemberDoroaddress}, #{aMemberJibunaddress}, #{aMemberDetailaddress}, NOW())
